title: Bank on Save Up St. Louis

abstracts.abstract: BOARD BILL NO. 78    INTRODUCED BY ALDERMAN CHRIS CARTER  An Ordinance authorizing and directing the Treasurer, on behalf of the City of St. Louis, to enter into and execute a Agreement with Bank-On Save-Up St. Louis, and authorizing the Treasurer to act as the independent fiscal agent for Bank-On Save-Up St. Louis and to expend funds by entering into contracts or otherwise for various purposes and containing an emergency clause.
